1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall -fno-warn-orphans #-}
3
4-- | HTML output.
5--
6-- Relations ('D.Rel') are formatted like:
7--
8--   > <div class="named-relation">
9--   >   <p class="name">JUDGEMENT-CLASS
10--   >   <table class="relation">
11--   >     <tr class="heading">
12--   >       <td class="term-name"><span class="term-slash">/</span>TERM-NAME
13--   >       <td class="term-name"><span class="term-slash">/</span>TERM-NAME
14--   >       ...
15--   >     <tr class="tuple">
16--   >       <td>CONTENT
17--   >       <td>CONTENT
18--   >       ...
19--   >     <tr class="tuple">
20--   >       <td>CONTENT
21--   >       <td>CONTENT
22--   >       ...
23--   >     ...
24--
25-- Abort reasons ('B.AbortReason') are formatted like:
26--
27--   > <div class="abort">
28--   >   <div class="abort-title">Aborted
29--   >   <div class="abort-reason">MAIN-REASON
30--   >   <div class="abort-detail">
31--   >     <div>DETAILED-REASON
32--   >     <div>DETAILED-REASON
33--   >     ...
34--   >
35--   >   <div class="abort-source">
36--   >     <div class="abort-pos">
37--   >       <div class="abort-index">
38--   >         <span class="abort-line">LINE
39--   >         <span class="abort-char">CHAR
40--   >         <span class="abort-path">PATH
41--   >       <pre class="abort-before">BEFORE-CODE
42--   >       <pre class="abort-after">AFTER-CODE
43--   >
44--   >     <div class="abort-pos">
45--   >       <div class="abort-index">
46--   >         <span class="abort-line">LINE
47--   >         <span class="abort-char">CHAR
48--   >         <span class="abort-path">PATH
49--   >       <pre class="abort-before">BEFORE-CODE
50--   >       <pre class="abort-after">AFTER-CODE
51--   >     ...
52--   >
53--   >   <div class="abort-note">
54--   >     <pre>NOTE-LINE
55--   >     <pre>NOTE-LINE
56--   >     ...
57--
58module Koshucode.Baala.Writer.Html
59  ( resultHtmlIndented,
60    resultHtmlCompact,
61    contToHtml,
62  ) where
63
64import qualified System.IO                          as IO
65import qualified Text.Blaze.XHtml5                  as H
66import           Text.Blaze.XHtml5                  ((!))
67import           Text.Blaze.XHtml5.Attributes       (class_)
68import qualified Text.Blaze.Html.Renderer.Pretty    as Hi
69import qualified Text.Blaze.Html.Renderer.String    as Hc
70import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture           as O
71import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base               as B
72import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type               as T
73import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data               as D
74import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax             as S
75import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core               as C
76
77-- | HTML output in indent format.
78resultHtmlIndented :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
79resultHtmlIndented = C.ResultWriterChunk "html-indented" (hPutHtml Hi.renderHtml)
80
81-- | HTML output in linear format.
82resultHtmlCompact :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
83resultHtmlCompact  = C.ResultWriterChunk "html-compact"  (hPutHtml Hc.renderHtml)
84
85hPutHtml :: (D.CContent c) => (H.Html -> String) -> C.ResultWriterChunk c
86hPutHtml render h _ status sh =
87    do hPutRel h render sh
88       return status
89
90hPutRel :: (D.CContent c) => IO.Handle -> (H.Html -> String) -> [C.ShortResultChunks c] -> IO ()
91hPutRel h render sh = put O.<#!> chunks where
92    chunks = concatMap S.shortBody sh
93    put (C.ResultRel cl r) = IO.hPutStrLn h $ render $ html cl r
94    put _                  = return ()
95    html cl r = div_ "named-relation" $ do
96                  H.p ! class_ "name" $ H.toMarkup cl
97                  contToHtml O.nothing $ D.pRel r
98
99-- | Encode term content in HTML.
100contToHtml :: (D.CContent c) => B.TransString -> c -> H.Html
101contToHtml sh = content where
102    content c
103        | D.isRel c = rel $ D.gRel c
104        | otherwise = H.toMarkup $ B.mixToFlatString $ B.mixTransEncode sh c
105
106    rel (T.Rel he bo) =
107        H.table ! class_ "relation" $ do
108          tr_ "heading" (term O.<#!> T.getTermNames he)
109          row O.<#!> bo
110
111    row cs = tr_ "tuple" (col O.<#!> cs)
112    col c  = H.td $ contToHtml sh c
113    term t = td_ "term-name" $ do
114               span_ "term-slash" $ H.toMarkup ("/" :: String)
115               H.toMarkup $ S.termNameContent t
116
117-- | Encode abort reason in HTML.
118--
119--   >>> let cp = B.CodePos 0 "<stdin>" 1 "abcdefg" "defg"
120--   >>> let Left a = B.abortable "tag" cp $ Left $ B.abortBecause "Bad luck"
121--   >>> putStrLn $ Hi.renderHtml $ H.toMarkup a
122--
123instance H.ToMarkup B.AbortReason where
124    toMarkup a =
125        div_ "abort" $ do
126          div_ "abort-title"   (text "Aborted")
127          div_ "abort-reason"  (text $ B.abortReason a)
128          div_ "abort-detail"  ((div' . dash) O.<#!> B.abortDetail a)
129          div_ "abort-source"  (loc    O.<#!> B.abortPointUp a)
130          div_ "abort-note"    (pre'   O.<#!> B.abortNote a)
131        where
132          text s          = H.toMarkup (s :: String)
133          div'            = H.div . H.toMarkup
134          pre'            = H.pre . H.toMarkup
135
136          dash (' ' : s)  = "– " ++ dash s
137          dash s          = s
138
139          loc (cp, _)     = pos cp
140          source k c      = span_ k (H.toMarkup c)
141          pos cp          = case B.cpMessage cp of
142                              (Just (lno, cno, path), before, Just after)
143                                  -> div_ "abort-pos" $ do
144                                       div_ "abort-index" $ do
145                                         source "abort-line" lno
146                                         source "abort-char" cno
147                                         source "abort-path" path
148                                       case before of
149                                         Nothing   -> return ()
150                                         Just code -> pre_ "abort-before" $ text code
151                                       pre_ "abort-after" $ text after
152                              _ -> return ()
153
154-- | 'H.div' with class name.
155div_ :: H.AttributeValue -> O.Map H.Html
156div_ c = H.div H.! class_ c
157
158-- | 'H.span' with class name.
159span_ :: H.AttributeValue -> O.Map H.Html
160span_ c = H.span H.! class_ c
161
162-- | 'H.tr' with class name.
163tr_ :: H.AttributeValue -> O.Map H.Html
164tr_ c = H.tr H.! class_ c
165
166-- | 'H.td' with class name.
167td_ :: H.AttributeValue -> O.Map H.Html
168td_ c = H.td H.! class_ c
169
170-- | 'H.pre' with class name.
171pre_ :: H.AttributeValue -> O.Map H.Html
172pre_ c = H.pre H.! class_ c
173
